19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Simak said:"I asked Jabir: 'Did the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) deliver the Khutbah standing?' He said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to deliver the Khutbah standing, then he would sit for a while, then stand up again
